overview: Jack is responsible for the technology strategy and product roadmap and leads the companyâ€™s product development delivering innovative mobile application solutions that encourage widespread adoption of data services. Jack brings over 20 years of wireless telecommunications leadership experience with mobile data and personal computer organizations at companies including Action Engine, Microsoft, Digital Electronics, and the United States Army. Prior to joining Perlego, Jack served as Director of Technical Services at Action Engine where he led all strategic alliance in developing mobile solutions.
